reviewText: For a relative of a friend, and they loved it.  I don't have a VHS player, so I don't know.

This movie was well written and directed and the acting was good, especially David Chokachi.  Good to know he can play a complex character with depth and conviction.  There was a lot of suspense in the film,  especially toward the ending, even though I already figured out who the  killer was before it was revealed.
